name: Yanoo Software
description:
Yanoo Software is one of the fast growing & highest rated professional services company by both revenue and number of professionals from over 15+ years.
 
Our Specialization is in Mobile and Web Development. We binge profoundly into our client’s business to apprehend their business segment, their target. We take client’s idea and apply our experience in order to reach their project's objective & vision.
 
We can help turn your idea into reality and accelerate your progress toward the goals .As part of this journey, we have made our presence in a different part of the globe. Yanoo has been successful in providing the environment where a diverse team shares technological expertise and applies their competencies to contribute to the company's capacity to meet the client's specific needs
 
Our Key Services:
 Mobile App development : Native and hybrid app deveopment for IOS and android
Web App development : Laravel, Codeigniter, Cake php, Yii, Core php.
E-Commerce Solution : Shopify, Magento, Woo-commerce, Open cart
CMS :  WordPress, joomla, Wix, squarespace
 
Let’s plan something incredible together!! Turn your Imaginary thoughts into reality with us!!
